entry.tran: 脸皮薄的;敏感的;易生气的
entry.def: If you say that someone is thin-skinned, you mean that they are easily upset by criticism or unpleasantness.

example.ex: Some fear he is too thin-skinned to survive the rough-and-tumble of a presidential campaign.
example.tran: 有人担心他脸皮太薄，经受不住总统选举的激烈竞争。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
